actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of appropriated funds to carry out or assist research on living human fetuses.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of any appropriated funds to carry out any research activity on a living human fetus which is removed alive from the womb of its mother or to assist any person in carrying out such research activity.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of appropriated funds to carry out or assist research on living human fetuses.
